bibl.title: The Scribe of the pagus: New Evidence for the Administration of Fourth Century Oxyrhynchos.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Preliminary transcription of P. Macq. Inv. 566 (a fuller edition will appear in a later publication). Petition from Aurelius Areion, a prophet, to an unnamed official. Oxyrhynchos, IVth cent.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Burchfield Richard L., The Scribe of the pagus: New Evidence for the Administration of Fourth Century Oxyrhynchos.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 99-106.
Preliminary transcription of P. Macq. Inv. 566 (a fuller edition will appear in a later publication). Petition from Aurelius Areion, a prophet, to an unnamed official. Oxyrhynchos, IVth cent.
